summary.para: Fills a tensor with a sequence. This operator performs the following pseudocode.
summary.code: for each coordinate in OutputTensor OutputTensor[coordinate] = Value Value += Delta endfor

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_SEQUENCE_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to write the results to. This tensor may have any size.

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_SEQUENCE_OPERATOR_DESC.ValueDataType
member.summary: The data type of Value field, which must match OutputTensor.DataType.

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_SEQUENCE_OPERATOR_DESC.ValueStart
member.summary: The initial value to fill the first element in the output, with ValueDataType determining how to interpret the field.

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_SEQUENCE_OPERATOR_DESC.ValueDelta
member.summary: A step to add to the value for each element written, with ValueDataType determining how to interpret the field.
